title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV26-020)
description: On January 13, 2026, Siemens published advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Industrial Edge Device Kit  x86-64 V1.24  version V1.24.2 and prior
Industrial Edge Device Kit  x86-64 V1.25  version V1.25.1 and prior
RUGGEDCOM APE1808  contact customer support to receive patch and update information
SIMATIC ET 200SP IM 155-6 PN HA (incl. SIPLUS variants)  version V1.3 and prior
SIMATIC ET 200SP IM 155-6 PN R1 (6ES7155-6AU00-0HM0)  version V6.0.1 and prior
SIMATIC ET 200SP IM 155-6 PN/3 HF (6ES7155-6AU30-0CN0)  version V4.2.2 and prior
SIMATIC PN/PN Coupler (6ES7158-3AD10-0XA0)  version V6.0.0 and prior
SIPLUS NET PN/PN Coupler (6AG2158-3AD10-4XA0)  version V6.0.0 and prior
Siemens Industrial Edge Devices  multiple versions and platforms
TeleControl Server Basic  versions V3.1.2.4 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
